productname: Live Tech Air RGB Cooling Pad Full Bright RGB LED Lights Laptop Cooling Pad 2 Big Fans for 15-17.3 Inch Ergonomics Stand Multiple Angel Gaming Pad(Air)
description:
WARRANTY - CONTACT EMAIL - info@live-tech.in , Technical Call - 9892186820 RGB LIGHTS: Live Tech Air laptop cooling pad applies full RGB lights to 2 big fans and both sides with red, green, blue, ice blue, light purple, 10 modes for debugging and choosing.
STRONG HEAT DISSAIPATION: 2 Turbine fans provide strong wind to bring airflow and blow the heat away. Metal panel absorbs heat from laptop due to the thermal conductivity to cool down the temperature of your notebook. The laptop cooling fan is especial designed
FRIENDLY BUTTONS: The 2 big turbofans are controlled by 1 button (last one) separately and the full rgb lights are controlled by 1 button (first one), and button "+" and "-" are for fan speed adjustment. 2 use ports are set in the top of the laptop cooler pad
WIDE COMPATIBILITY: The cooler for laptop is 16" long, 11" wide, and the diagonal length is 18.3", the computer cooling pad is compatible with 15 inch to 18 inch laptops.
ERGONOMIC STAND: The gaming laptop cooling pad raises and tilts your laptop to the perfect ergonomic viewing position. Multi-angle adjusts from 7 to 30 degrees and height adjusts from 2.7 to 6.33 inches
